content: > these socks will always remind me of a > very special trip to michigan in july > 2019 there were many hours spent having amazing conversations with > friends knitting on the porch of an > adorable farmhouse we were staying at > we were soaking up every minute > together on the porch are a play on > the simplicity of bold modern accent > stripes in a classic stockinette > sock the pattern is delightfully > uncomplicated so you can knit it > wherever you may be and using up > tiny bits of treasured yarns if > you ve always wanted to try a pair > this is fantastic for your first > venture into hand knit socks ♡♡♡ > happy knitting friends tracie x some highlights of the on the porch sock pattern - cuff down - magic loop knitting easily modified to dpns - jazzy stockinette almost a vanilla sock but with modern slip_stitch colour work knitting you only use one colour at a time for this no floats no complicated yarn management - you can incorporate mini skeins or tiny bits of precious leftover yarns for the stripes - using a self striping yarn one stripe can equal one use for a contrast colour - delightfully uncomplicated relaxing knitting perfect for visiting travel and just zen knitting truly happy knitting **medium sample used mc - 56 g cc1 - 14 g cc2 - 3 g cc3 - 3 g** as always this pattern has been professionally tech edited and test knit by enthusiastic passionate generous knitters thank you all so much x please send any pattern support questions to knitsleeprepeatdesigns@gmail com thank you so much for your support ♡
